original_text: Peter answered and said unto him, Though all men shall be offended because of thee, yet will I never be offended.
korean_text: 베드로가 대답하여 이르되 모두 주를 버릴지라도 나는 결코 버리지 않겠나이다

sentences.original_text: Peter answered and said unto him,
Though all men shall be offended because of thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 모든 사람이 너를 인해 실족할지라도,

sentences.original_text: yet will I never be offended.
